name: places/ChIJM_RjtKBZwokRTIjIb8XBvpw
formattedAddress: 1601 York Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1601 York Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: They have the healthiest and most diversified selection of plants in the city, especially the big sized ones. You have to see them in person to know how beautiful those plants are. The owner is very nice and knowledgeable. They also have a “doctor” in the house who takes great care of the plants and can help you repot the plants when they grow bigger. The plants I got from them thrive in our home with just sunshine and water.  See the photos by yourself! This place is a hidden gem.

text.text: They have the healthiest and most diversified selection of plants in the city, especially the big sized ones. You have to see them in person to know how beautiful those plants are. originalText.text: Their new location is absolutely beautiful! The team has always been so willing to help me learn about my plants, explore new plants, and carefully repot my existing ones. I’ve also been able to visit with photos for advice as well and have always had a great experience. Will continue to be a reoccurring customer and happy to have them in the neighborhood!

text.text: Their new location is absolutely beautiful! The team has always been so willing to help me learn about my plants, explore new plants, and carefully repot my existing ones. I’ve also been able to visit with photos for advice as well and have always had a great experience. Will continue to be a reoccurring customer and happy to have them in the neighborhood!

originalText.text: I have no idea how anyone can have something bad to say about this business! I’ve been in neighborhood for 5 years and every single visit is another amazing surprise. They completely transformed my terrace with flower boxes and artificial leaves and it’s nothing short of amazing. Chris and Johnny are the best ever! Try them, let them be creative. You won’t be disappointed!

text.text: I have no idea how anyone can have something bad to say about this business! I’ve been in neighborhood for 5 years and every single visit is another amazing surprise. originalText.text: Such a friendly neighborhood florist, Mr Johnny is an excellent and qualified florist who was so incredibly helpful when I, a non-flower person, came into his store to purchase a bouquet. I will be the first to admit, I know next to nothing about flowers asides from their need for water and sunlight. Mr Johnny's expertise and enthusiasm guided me in my purchase, which I am highly pleased with! A beautiful arrangement of multicolored flowers that reflects the season of Fall, and whilst there, I got an exquisite violet Orchid plant as well!

originalText.text: First went to hybrid florist at their old location and looooooove them and love the new location. I’m just getting into house plants and they are so helpful and teach me everything I need to know and I’m able to bring my plants back to them for some help. Best customer service in the neighborhood and always willing to help. There is one one star review on here that brings the rating down but hybrid florist doesn’t deserve that, the review claims they blast “hop hop boom music”? Whatever that is and every time I’ve gone in there they have music playing at a completely reasonable level, nothing more than a grocery store so don’t listen to that cranky reviewer. Hybrid florist deserves 5 stars.
